Interface CLibrary

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    BSDCLibrary, FreeBSDCLibrary, LinuxCLibrary, SolarisCLibrary

    Author:
    Kohsuke Kawaguchi

      static class  CLibrary.passwd
      Comparing http://linux.die.net/man/3/getpwnam and my Mac OS X reveals that the structure of this field isn't very portable.

      • getgrouplist

        int getgrouplist(String user,
                 int group,
                 Memory groups,
                 IntByReference ngroups)
        Lists up group IDs of the given user. On Linux and most BSDs, but not on Solaris. See http://www.gnu.org/software/hello/manual/gnulib/getgrouplist.html

      • _getgroupsbymember

        int _getgroupsbymember(String user,
                       Memory groups,
                       int maxgids,
                       int numgids)
        getgrouplist equivalent on Solaris. See http://mail.opensolaris.org/pipermail/sparks-discuss/2008-September/000528.html

        CLibrary.group getgrgid(int gid)
